Title: Part 12: The Dragon Smaug
Text:
Bilbo helped me to open the door, now I have to go in search of the dragon Smaug.
To banish him from this country once and for all.
CompleteText:
I did it!
Smaug is no more!
After a long and hard fight I defeated him!

The dwarves have the Erebor back.
My journey is complete.

But Middle-earth is not safe yet.. an old shadow is growing in the east.
More tasks are waiting for me!

(Quest: "The Way of the Hobbit" Ends Here, Thanks for Playing)
